# dverse 0.0.1.9002 (2024-11-05)

* `document_universe()` with older versions of R no longer errors when handling
strings prefixed with "." (#10). This expands the compatible versions of R to >=
3.6.

# dverse v0.0.1

* Initial CRAN release.
